content.rendered:
DEEPER ANALYSIS FOR
EXPERT TRADER

A trading platform with multi market depth and performance optimization for better trading.

  • CLASSIC
  • ORDER FLOW
  • PERFORMANCE OPTIMAZATION

Analyse price pattern and indicators signal

OpixTrade supports many different data providers. You have
complete freedom of choice – you can use one, two, or multiple data
sources at the same time.

OpixTrade supports many different data providers. You have complete freedom of choice – you can use one, two, or multiple data sources at the same time.
  • Custom timeframe
  • 50+ indicators
  • 30+ drawings
  • And more

Get informed of global trading activities

Designed specifically for expert traders with full set of functionalities
for analysis and trading. Get more market information than your brokers.

Designed specifically for expert traders with full set of functionalities for analysis and trading. Get more market information than your brokers.

  • TPO chart
  • DOM trading
  • Time & Sales
  • Imbalance
  • Delta indicators
  • And more

Improve your trading results

Trade like a machine. Designed from first principles to backtest and
optimize trading systems using best-practice. A strategy tester to
view each opportunity’s profit/loss and smart monitor your strategy.
Trade like a machine. Designed from first principles to backtest and optimize trading systems using best-practice. A strategy tester to view each opportunity’s profit/loss and smart monitor your strategy.
  • VAR backtesting
  • Gross performance
  • Average execution time
  • Max drawdown/ run up
  • Equity curve
  • And more

5 REASON TO TRADE

WITH OPIXTRADE

Multiple Data
Providers

Algorithm
Trading

VisualStudio
Connect

BackTesting

Real-Time
Market Scanner

SET UP YOUR

TRADING STRATEGIES

Create your own automated strategies from indicators, price feeds and DOM

Technical Analysis

Classic indicators help you to improve your entry and exit strategies. Draw trend lines with automated software which updates every five minutes.

Order Flow

Level 2 data is accessible to ten levels of depth on each side. Catch lucrative opportunities when the momentum lead by the volume impact hits the market.

Trade Simulator

Test your strategy in realistic fills on Limit Orders and realistic slippage on Market and Stop Orders.

OUR EXPERT

DATA FEEDS

OPIXTRADE

ARCHITECTURE

EXPERT TRADERS

Money Managers

Algorithmic
Traders

Quant Traders

Day Traders

Scalpers

FRONT - END

Web - Application

ECNS

EXCHANGES

LIQUIDITY
PROVIDERS

FIX/ JAVA API

BACK - END

Backoffice

Opixtech Server

STOCKS

FOREX

CFDs

RETAIL BROKER

NEWSLETTER

Subscribe to our Newsletter! Receive OpixTrade News & Updates direct to your inbox!
